short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tickkl is a time tracking tool that will help you enhance your time management and productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover a new dimension in time management with our Chrome extension. Crafted for those who demand excellence, it offers a premium experience in time tracking and automates your daily routines. Benefit from an in-depth reporting system, master your projects with our budgeting tools, and anticipate every move with our forecasting features. And for the cherry on top? Seamless integration with Slack. 
Dive in and enhance your efficiency. 
Happy tracking!
